entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
